objective: Dedicated and enthusiastic engineering student with a strong academic background seeking opportunities to apply and further develop technical skills in a challenging and innovative environment.
skills: Programming Languages: C, CSS, HTML, Java, JavaScript, Python

certifications.name: IBM Full Stack Software Developer Professional Certificate

education.degree: Bachelor of Technology (B.Tech) in Electronics and Telecommunication Engineering
education.institution: Vishwakarma Institute of Technology, Bibwewadi, Pune

projects.name: Hostel Management System
projects.description: Developed a comprehensive hostel management system that efficiently handles student registrations, room allocations, and inventory management.
projects.details: Implemented the back-end using PHP and MySQL, and the front-end using JavaScript, HTML, and CSS to store and retrieve student and hostel information securely.

projects.name: Smart Ticketing System and Overcrowding Control
projects.description: Created a smart ticketing system using RFID technology for the ticketing process for public transportation.
projects.details: Implemented GSM technology to send real-time messages to the transportation authorities and passengers for timely interventions.
projects.publication: The research paper has been published in the IEEE Conference

projects.name: Advancing Landmark Detection: A Vision Transformer Approach
projects.description: Developed a deep learning-based advanced ViT image classifier for identifying landmarks.
projects.details: Achieved high accuracy in dynamic conditions by leveraging Vision Transformer architecture, enhancing applications in tourism, navigation, and cultural heritage preservation.
projects.publication: The research paper has been accepted at the IEEE Conference
